mapper.update: UPDATE customer c, (SELECT customer_id, max(rental_date), datediff(NOW(), max(rental_date)) FROM rental GROUP BY customer_id HAVING datediff(NOW(), max(rental_date)) > 365) A SET c.active = 0 WHERE c.customer_id = A.customer_id

name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%')

SELECT c.customer_id ID, CONCAT(c.first_name,' ', c.last_name) name, COUNT(*) overdue FROM customer c, rental r, inventory i, film f WHERE c.customer_id = r.customer_id AND r.inventory_id = i.inventory_id AND i.film_id = f.film_id AND DATEDIFF(r.return_date, r.rental_date) > f.rental_duration GROUP BY NAME HAVING COUNT(*) > 20

SELECT c.customer_id customerId, c.first_name firstName, c.last_name lastName, c.email, c.create_date createDate, a.address, a.district, a.address2, a.postal_code postalCode, ct.city, cy.country FROM customer c, address a, city ct, country cy WHERE c.address_id = a.address_id AND a.city_id = ct.city_id AND ct.country_id = cy.country_id AND c.customer_id = #{customerId}
